yBully is a chrome extension for detecting cyberbullying tweets on twitter along with restricting users from posting any bully tweet and more...

Features
========
1. Detect cyberbullying tweets on twitter across all pages.
2. Blur / Label tweets that are bully.
3. Restrict users from posting any bully tweet.
4. Report incorrectly predicted tweets.
5. Increase your trust score by getting your reported tweets approved.
6. Trusted users can directly contribute to the data being sent to model during retraining.
7. View your statistics.
